availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Bailey (Taylor County, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Fisher Bailey in Taylor County, Kentucky on January 15, 1850. Father of Samuel D. Bailey, Thomas T. Bailey, and William C. Bailey. Farmer in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1850. Hotel Keeper in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Division 1, p. 182B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Division 2, p. 648.
Find A Grave, "Col John Bailey (1820-1893)," Memorial #46708053, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46708053 (accessed January 17, 2020).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000983727, p.89.
